external_references.description: Gross, J. (2016, February 23). Operation Dust Storm. Retrieved December 22, 2021.

description: During [Operation Dust Storm](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0016), the threat actors used a watering hole attack on a popular software reseller to exploit the then-zero-day Internet Explorer vulnerability CVE-2014-0322.(Citation: Cylance Dust Storm)
